attributes.action: Stop the advertising of the illegal unrecognised territory "North Cyprus" in UK
attributes.background: "North Cyprus" or (TRNC) as it's referred to; is the product of an illegal invasion of Cyprus by Turkey in 1974. Thousands of Cypriots were murdered by the invading army and displaced from their homes and homeland. "North Cyprus" is not recognised by ANY country in the world apart from Turkey.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for advertising countries.
